title: Retail asset securitisation volumes at Rs 48,000 crore in June quarter: CARE Ratings
description: Retail asset securitisation market shrinks by 13% to Rs 48,000 crore in June quarter. Originators flush with liquidity cited as primary reason. Increase in investor demand for PSL assets noted. MBS transactions lead DA volumes. Prediction of strong market performance in FY25.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
